Name: Silver Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Dry and aromatic with a hint of maraschino richness.
History: Adapted from the Silver Cocktail in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book : " SILVER COCKTAIL. 2 Dashes Maraschino. 2 Dashes Orange Bitters. ½ French Vermouth. ½ Dry Gin. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. "
Nutrition: One serving of Silver Martini contains 170 calories
